title: Personal Loan – Beginner to Advanced Guide
seoTitle: Personal Loan – Beginner to Advanced Guide | Fincado
metaDescription: Learn everything about Personal Loan including eligibility, interest rates, EMI calculation, risks and benefits in India.
content:
Personal Loan – Beginner to Advanced Guide

Personal Loan is one of the most commonly used financial tools in India. Whether you're salaried or self-employed, understanding how personal loan works helps you save money and avoid bad debt.

What is Personal Loan?

Personal Loan is a financial product that allows individuals to access funds for specific purposes while repaying through monthly EMIs or systematic investments depending on the category.

How Personal Loan Works in India

  • Interest is calculated using RBI approved methods
  • Tenure ranges from 6 months to 30 years
  • Your CIBIL score directly impacts approval

Eligibility Criteria

  • Age: 21–65 years
  • Minimum monthly income
  • Stable job or business proof
  • Credit score above 700 preferred

Interest Rates in 2025

Interest rates typically range between 8.45% to 24% depending on your profile and lender.

How EMI / Returns Are Calculated

You can calculate monthly EMIs or investment returns using standard formulas or by using our in-built calculators.

Advantages

  • Quick access to funds
  • Predictable monthly payments
  • Tax benefits in applicable cases

Risks & Common Mistakes

  • Taking longer tenure than necessary
  • Ignoring foreclosure charges
  • Missing EMIs leading to credit damage

Tax Benefits (If Applicable)

  • Section 80C – Principal benefits
  • Section 24 – Interest benefits

Final Verdict

Personal Loan can be a powerful financial tool when used wisely. Always compare multiple lenders, calculate your EMI properly, and ensure the repayment fits your income.
